Content: The haul of knives that disappeared from the Ampara Sugar Company has been recovered. 177 knives used to cut sugarcane disappeared on the 29 of last month from the Muwangalla No‚Äù 04 stores of the Sugar Company. A certain group in the night had broken the locks of the stores and taken away the knives. Following information received by the Police these knives were recovered at a location near the Gal Oya River, four kilometres away from the Stores. A suspect has been arrested in this respect with the support of an official Police Dog. The Police said that another suspect is due to be apprehended.
